text: Remove and insert lines in a text file
I have a text file looks like:

code:
first line  
second line  
third line  
forth line  
fifth line  
sixth line

text: I want to replace the third and forth lines with three new lines.

code:
first line  
second line  
new line1  
new line2  
new line3    
fifth line  
sixth line

text: How can I do this using Python?
